parameters.label: Camera
parameters.infoText: Whether to affect the main game camera or the hud camera.

parameters.label: Intensity
parameters.infoText: How intense the camera shake should be. Note that high values may cause the camera shake to become distracting.

parameters.label: Duration
parameters.infoText: How long the shake should last.

parameters.label: Time Unit
parameters.infoText: The unit of measurement that should be used for the Duration parameter.
